properties.body:
WESTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 14.
40 FOOT S/V LUVA LUVA, TWO PERSONS ON BOARD,
DISABLED AND ADRIFT DUE TO ENGINE FAILURE AND
FLOODING IN 15-30.74N 058-07.20W AT 281402Z DEC.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO
MRCC FORT DE FRANCE, INMARSAT: 422799024,
TELEX: 42912008, PHONE: 5965 9670 9292,
FAX: 5965 9663 2450, E-MAIL: ANTILLES@MRCCFR.EU.
